name: Destabilize Powder
components: V, S, M (a few drops of liquor)
text: This spell makes the ammunition in the target firearm is prone to misfire. Increase the misfire range by 1 + 1 per five caster levels (maximum +5) for the ammunition currently loaded into that firearm. If aware of this spell’s effect prior to firing the altered ammunition (a DC 17 Spellcraft check to identify the spell being cast or similar effect), the firearm’s user can spend a standard action to clear the altered ammunition from the firearm. Doing so destroys that ammunition.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 材料 (一些烈酒)
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (物体)
text_zh:
这个法术让目标火器的火药容易不发火。

增加目标火器当前弹药1加上每5施法者等级1 (最高+5) 的不发火范围。

如果目标武器的使用者在使用受术弹药开火之前就知道这种法术的效果 (DC17的法术辨识或者类似效果以鉴定出该法术)，那么火器使用者可以使用标准动作来将弹药退膛清除。这么做会摧毁这发弹药。
